questionText:
(a)

 

Kyerɛ sɛnti nnan a wobɛpɛ sɛ wokɔ Ntoasoɔ Sɔkuu (SHS) pɔtee bi berɛ a woawie Junior High School.

(b)

 

Woyɛ wo gyinapɛn sofoɔ panin. Kyerɛ sɛnti nnan a ɛsɛ sɛ wo mfɛfoɔ no ba sukuu ntɛm.

(c)

 

Twerɛ lɛtɛ kuma w'adamfo a ɔwɔ sukuu foforɔ mu na kyerɛ no w'adamfo a wopɛ n'asɛm pa ara ho asɛm. Kyerɛ sɛnti mmienu a wopɛ n'asɛm.

(d)

 

Kyerɛ sɛnti nnan a wopene anaa wompene mmaatwa so wɔ Mfitiaseɛ Sukuu mu.

  

PART IICOMPREHENSION(10 Marks)

Kenkan deɛ ɛdidi soɔ yi na bua nsɛmmisa no nyinaa.
subject: Asante Twi

questionText:
Ɔpanin bi tenaa ase a na ɔwɔ yerenom baanu. Ɔwaree ne yere panin no, mfeɛ num akyi na ɔwaree kumaa no nso. Na ne yere kumaa no yɛ obonini. Ne yere panin no deɛ na ɔyɛ ɔwofoɔ a ɔwɔmma baasa.

Na ɔpanin yi a ɔyɛ okuani no wɔ mfuo akɛseɛ mmiɛnsa. Ɔde mfuo no mu mmienu maa ne yerenom no sɛ wɔnyɛ mu nnwuma mfa. Obiara yeree ne ho yɛɛ ne deɛmu adwuma. Sɛ wode mfuo mmienu no toto ho a,kumaa no deɛ yɛɛ frɔmfrɔm senee ɔpanin no yei maa kumaa no bɛyɛɛ osikani maa ne werɛ firii awerɛhoɔ a na ɔdi wɔ awoɔ a na ɔnwo no ho. Na ɔtaa de ne sika totɔ ntadeɛ ma ne kora mma no.

Ɛduruu mmerɛ bi no, ɔyere kumaa no hunuu sɛ nsakyeraeɛ aba ne kora no nneyɛɛ mu. Ne saa nti, ɔyere kumaa no yɛɛ n'adwene sɛ ɔnyɛ ade pa biara a ɛbɛsɔ ne kora no ani bio.

Ɛbaa saa no, anwanwadeɛ bi sii ɔyere kumaa no afuom hɔ. Mmoa bi hyɛɛ aseɛ sɛee n'afuo no maa no kɔbɔɔ ne kunu amanneɛ.

Yei maa ne kunu no kɔɔ afuom hɔ hɔhwɛɛ deɛ asie no. Ɔhunuu Ɔnwansane kɛseɛ bi sɛ ɔresɛe afuo no, ɔgyenee n'ani hwɛɛ Ɔnwansane kɛseɛ no too ne tuo. Aboa no danee nipa a na ɔsɛ ne yere panin no. Ɔpanin no ho dwirii no yie.

(a)

 

Ɔpanin no yere mu hwan na ɔyɛ obonini?

(b)

 

Na ɔpanin no mma yɛ sɛn?

(c)

 

Wogye di sɛ deɛn nti na ɔpanin no de mfuo no mu mmienu maa ne yerenom no?

(d)

 

Kyerɛ saa asɛm yi ase sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ wɔ ayɛsɛm no mu: frɔmfrɔm.

(e)

 

Adɛn nti na ɔyere kumaa no yɛɛ n'adwene sɛ ɔmmoa ne kora mma no bio?

(f)

 

Anwanwadeɛ sononko bɛn na ɔyere kumaa no hunuu wɔ n'afuo no mu?

(g)

 

Adɛn nti na ne kunu no too ɔnwansane kɛseɛ no tuo?

(h)

 

Ɔpanin no too ɔnwansane kɛseɛ no tuo no, anwanwadeɛ bɛn na esiiɛ?

(i)

 

Adesuadeɛ bɛn na wosua firii ayɛsɛm no mu?

(j)

 

Fa nsɛmfua a ɛmmoro nson to ayɛsɛm no din.

  

PART IIILEXIS AND STRUCTURE(20 Marks)
subject: Asante Twi

questionText:
Yiyi nsɛmmisa a ɛwɔ ɔfa ha yi nyinaa ano.

Fa nkabomdeɛ a ɛfata hyɛ baabi a wɔagya wɔ ɔkasamu no mu

(a)

 

Adam ...... Abu bɛba.

(b)

 

Ebia Simli ...... Aisha na ɔbɛsoa adaka no.

(c)

 

Yɛahunu polisini no ...... yɛnhunuu ɔkorɔmfoɔ no.

(d)

 

Merenkɔ fie ...... menni sika.

(e)

 

Yarefoɔ no ntumi nnante ...... wofa no.

Twerɛ nsɛmfuakuo a ɛdidi soɔ yi mu biara ho nhwɛsoɔ baako

(f)

 

Din pa;

(g)

 

Edin a yɛnhunu;

(h)

 

Adeyɔ

(i)

 

Edin nkyerɛkyerɛmu;

(j)

 

Edinnsiananmu.

Twerɛ nsɛmfua a wɔatwitwa aseɛ wɔ ɔkasamu a ɛdidi soɔ yi mu biara abirahɔ

(k)

 

Kande yɛ abaayewa a ne ho yɛ fɛ

(l)

 

Ɔkyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no twaa asuafoɔ no dwumadie no ntɛmntɛm

(m)

 

Asuafoɔ no so panin no nim adeɛ pa ara.

(n)

 

Hei Akua! Tena ha.

(o)

 

Halim hyɛ atadeɛ tenten.

Twerɛ edin nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛwɔ ɔkasamu a ɛdidi soɔ yi biara mu

(p)

 

Ɔhene no tɔɔ pɔnkɔ fitaa.

(q)

 

Ɔbaa a ɔbɔ duku akokɔsradeɛ no yɛ me maame.

(r)

 

Yɛn kyerɛkyerɛni yɛ ɔbarima nyansafoɔ.

(s)

 

Papa tiatia no yɛ lɔyani.

(t)

 

Amango a abere biara nni dua no so.
subject: Asante Twi

questionText:
(a)

 

Wo papa pɛ sɛ woyɛ lɔyani anaa tikyani. Twerɛ lɛtɛ kɔma no, na kyerɛ sɛnti ɛnam na wopɛ sɛ woyɛ mu baako.

(b)

 

Kyerɛkyerɛ nnoɔma ahodoɔ mmienu a ɛde lɔre akwanhyia ba mu, na kyerɛ akwan ahodoɔ mmienu a yɛbɛfa so asi ano.

(c)

 

Ka onipa bi a wopɛ n'asɛm pa ara wɔ wo kurom ho asɛm, na kyerɛ deɛ nti a wopɛ n'asɛm.

(d)

 

Twerɛ abasɛm bi a n'awieeɛ ne sɛ, " ... na ɔnuu ne ho wɔ deɛ ɔyɛeɛ no ho".

 

PART IICOMPREHENSION[10 marks]

Kenkan deɛ ɛdidi soɔ yi na bua nsɛmmisa no nyinaa.
subject: Asante Twi

questionText:
Mfeɛ pii nie na nsaase akɔ ahohiahia mu pa ara. Nkurɔfoɔ kɔ so ara sɛe nneɛma a ɛboa ma asetena kɔ so no. Ɔdomankoma asaase a ɔde ama yɛn no, saa nkurɔfoɔ no kɔ so di no nya.

Emu deɛ ereha adwene pa ara Ghana ha nnɛ yi ne "galamsey". Saa ɔkwan a wɔfa so tu fam agudeɛ yi asɛe asaase ma adane ɛserɛ. Sɛ wohwɛ ɔkwan a wɔn a wɔnni tumi krataa biara no fa so tu fam agudeɛ no si funtum asaase no a, ɛyɛ awerɛho yie. Yɛn kwaeɛ nyinaa asɛe koraa. Abɔfoɔ ne abɛtwafoɔ nam wɔn dwumadie so ama yɛn kwaeɛ no mu ɛfa kɛseɛ no ara ahye dwerɛbee.

Yɛn nsubɔntene, nsuwansuwa ne atadeɛ mpo nyina ho akeka. Na mpo, nnipa nam wɔn nneyɛɛ ahodoɔ so asɛe ɛpo kɛseɛ no. Yei ama ayɛ hu ama nnipa a wɔtete ho ne abɔdeɛ a wɔwɔ mu no nyinaa. Saa adeɛ yi reyɛ agye nsam. Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ biribi de si ano seesei ara. Ɛsɛ sɛ mpanimfoɔ sɔre waka yɛ biribi de si saa ɔhaw no ano.

(a)

 

Ɛdeɛn na nkurɔfoɔ resɛe no no?

(b)

 

Ɛdeɛn na yɛnya firi Ɔdomankoma asaase a ɔde ama yɛn no mu?

(c)

 

Adɛn nti na galamsey ne adeɛ a ɛreha yɛn?

(d)

 

Dwuma bɛn na abɔfoɔ ne abɛtwafoɔ di de ma yɛn kwaeɛ hye dwerɛbee?

(e)

 

Kyerɛ saa nsɛm yi ase sɛdeɛ wɔde di dwuma wɔ akenkansɛm no mu:

(i)

 

di no nya;

(ii)

 

funtum.

(f)

 

Kyerɛ dwuma baako a nnipa nam so sɛe ɛpo.

(g)

 

Adɛn nti na abɔdeɛ ahodoɔ a wɔwɔ ɛpo mu no nni ahotɔ?

(h)

 

Adɛn na ɔtwerɛfoɔ na ka sɛ, ɛreyɛ agye nsam?

(i)

 

Kyerɛ saa asɛm yi ase sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ wɔ akenkansɛm no mu: sɔre waka.

(j)

 

Adesuadeɛ bɛn na woanya afiri akenkansɛm no mu?

 

PART IIITRANSLATION[10 marks]
subject: Asante Twi

questionText:
Kyerɛ deɛ ɛdidi soɔ yi ase kɔ Asante Twi mu.

(a)

 

She likes washing her clothes on Fridays.

(b)

 

Martha came here but did not meet you.

(c)

 

Why is Abiba not coming to eat with us?

(d)

 

We do not like her but we have to contain her.

(e)

 

Ama cooked the food and Kojo washed the bowls.

(f)

 

Our teacher shouted, "shut up, all of you!"

(g)

 

Why is Kofi unhappy these days?

(h)

 

The game was lost through carelessness.

(i)

 

We do not want to fail the examination.

(j)

 

Tell him to see me at once.

  

PART IVLANGUAGE AND USAGE[10 marks]
subject: Asante Twi

questionText:
Yiyi nsɛmmisa a ɛwɔ ɔfa ha nyinaa ano.

Nsɛmmisa (a) - (g) mu no, kyerɛ asɛmfuakuo a nsɛmfua a wɔasan aseɛ no firi mu.

(a)

 

Mansa maa no sika.

(b)

 

Yɛbɛyɛ adwuma no abom.

(c)

 

Nanabarima annye me frɛ no so.

(d)

 

Wɔkyeree ɔbaa daadaafoɔ no nnɛ.

(e)

 

Yɛn awofoɔ bɛduruu dwoodwoo nnora.

(f)

 

M'awofoɔ maa me tɛlɛvihyen.

(g)

 

Ɔbɛware wɔ yɛn akuraa hɔ saa bosome yi.

Nsɛmmisa (h) - (j) mu no, fa atwerɛ mu agyinahyɛdeɛ a ɛfata wie ɔkasamu biara.

(h)

 

Berɛ bɛn na Abankwa firii fie

(i)

 

Yɛtɔɔ amango aprɛ ne ankaa.

(j)

 

Mo nyinaa nyɛ komm
subject: Asante Twi
